scripts.build:crx: bun run build && bun run crx
scripts.build:xpi: bun run build && bun run xpi
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run crx && bun run xpi
scripts.crx: mkdir -p builds && crx pack dist -o builds/imgs-extension.crx -p key.pem
scripts.xpi: mkdir -p builds && web-ext build -s dist -a builds --filename imgs-extension.xpi
